- A [93mProbabilistic[0m [93mAtomic[0m [93mRadius[0m [93mDefinition[0m: [93mApplication[0m to [93mGround[0m [93mState[0m [93mHydrogen[0m-[93mLike[0m [93mAtoms[0m
